title: Will the teams ranked queue be coming back next year?
body: I miss ranked teams, and while 5 man flex is fun having a set team name and climbing as a team would be awesome to do again. I heard that there were plans to bring it back at some stage, but do you think we can expect it next season?

replies.body: I prefer 5v5 over flex. But it's very unlikely imo that they will remove flex and bring back 5v5.

there was a post about this kind of thing a while back. I can't find it to save my life but if i remember correctly basically:

Riot are looking to implement like a "tournament" system kind of thing but its a ways off. Basically you get put into a league with 4-9 other teams, so you are able to scout your opponents out and target bans/picks etc... I'm pretty sure they said the target date was by the end of 2018 but again, i cant find the source to corroborate.

edit: i found this which isn't exactly it. but maybe what they were talking about has changed into this.
http://comicbook.com/gaming/2017/08/31/league-of-legends-is-testing-a-new-team-based-tournament-mode/
